content: beginner friendly this project details instructions for a glove world hat inspired by the glove hats seen in spongebob the pattern is worked in joint rounds and requires sewing pieces together materials include a 6 50mm hook yarn of choice scissors thread and a sewing needle the thread is used to embroider details on the front i used super bulky yarn in a white/beige color and a slightly darker color for the thread my finished project measured approximately 5 in x 4 in i used less than a skein of yarn the measurements for the hat will differ depending on your choice of yarn and hook size you may need to add/subtract row if you choose a different yarn weight contact me on my instagram @chamomilewonders for any questions happy crocheting ♡
